template.subject: %ASSESSOR_FULLNAME% Assessing %TARGET_TITLE% [%CONTENT_TITLE%] - Flagged Response(s) Selected
template.body:
An assessment has been completed by a user [%ASSESSOR_FULLNAME%] in which at least one response was set to be flagged if selected.
Further details regarding this user's completed assessment can be found below:
Title: %CONTENT_TITLE%
The completed assessment can be found here: %URL%
Regards,
The %APPLICATION_NAME% team, %ENTRADA_URL%
